text: Malaya Balzuga () is a rural locality (a village) in Novotatyshlinsky Selsoviet, Tatyshlinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 246 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 15 km from Verkhniye Tatyshly, 5 km from Novyye Tatyshly. == References == Category:Rural localities in Tatyshlinsky District
title: Malaya Balzuga
